inclusion.criterion: patients with severe symptomatic aortic stenosis secondary to degenerative disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: confirmed by transthoracic echocardiography (mean gradient >40 mmHg and/or valve area <1 cm2)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: with significant coronary artery disease (epicardial coronary stenosis angiography >= 50%)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe CAD with tritroncular lesions or severe stenosis (>90 %) of left main artery or proximal left anterior descending artery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Lack of viability in myocardial territory of interest
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of bypass coronary surgery or heart transplantation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe left ventricular systolic dysfunction, characterized by an ejection fraction < 35 %
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe renal impairment (Creatinine clearance <30 ml/min/1.73 m2)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe symptomatic aortic stenosis and significant coronary artery disease, but no severe CAD with tritroncular lesions or severe stenosis of left main artery or proximal left anterior descending artery.
